title: Drafting the Most Exciting Things of the 2022 NFL Season
description:
Sheil is joined by Danny Kelly to pick the things they are most excited for in the 2022 season, including Russell Wilson in Denver (1:00), second-year quarterbacks (19:00), and Jerry Jones’s postgame press conferences (41:00).
Host: Sheil Kapadia
Guest: Danny Kelly
Associate Producer: Mike Wargon
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal and Conor Nevins
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
